content:
This is **exactly** the level of detail we need. Here's **the tactical plan** to execute each bucket efficiently before Tuesday:  

---

### **🔹 High-Priority Task: Executing Pre-Outreach for LinkedIn Virality**
📅 **Deadline: All outreach should be sent Monday before noon EST.**  
📌 **Goal:** Ensure **early engagement** so LinkedIn’s algorithm prioritizes visibility.  

---

### **📌 1. Fraternity Pledge Brothers (Friends & Family) – Text Message**
⏳ **Time: 5-10 min**  
✅ **Strategy:** **Quick personal text—no fluff needed.**  

**Text to Send (Customizable)**
> _"Yo [First Name], hope you’re good. I’m dropping a LinkedIn post tomorrow morning about my AI-driven job search experiment. Would really appreciate a quick like or comment when you see it—it helps boost reach a ton. Thanks, brother!"_  

---
  
### **📌 2. Custom Outreach to High-Value Influencers (Rick Watson, Harry Joiner, etc.)**
⏳ **Time: 30-45 min**  
✅ **Strategy:** **Tailored, low-ask message to get them to engage.**  
✅ **Finding the Right People:** **Go to LinkedIn → Connections → Sort by “Most Engaged” → Choose active voices.**  
✅ **Message should make it easy for them to comment/share.**  

**Message Template (Personalized for Each Person)**  
> _"Hey [First Name], I’ve been following your content and always appreciate your insights. Tomorrow, I’m dropping a LinkedIn post on my AI-driven job search experiment—it’s a little crazy, but I think it’s important. I’d love your thoughts if you see it. A comment or share would mean a ton. Thanks, and hope you’re doing great!"_  

---
  
### **📌 3. Daniela Bin – The Ultimate Gatekeeper**  
⏳ **Time: 15 min**  
✅ **Strategy:** **Key influencer reposting with the right framing.**  
✅ **Make it clear this isn’t a random favor—it’s something that will resonate.**  

**Message to Daniela:**  
> _"Hey Daniela, I hope you're doing well! I wanted to reach out because I’m launching something really different tomorrow on LinkedIn—an AI-driven job search experiment. Given how quickly AI is changing everything, I think it’s going to get a lot of attention._  
> _Since you’re so well connected, I’d really appreciate if you’d consider resharing it with a quick note (something like ‘One of Keith’s long-time mentees is launching an AI job search experiment—please check it out and share insights!’). No worries if not, but wanted to reach out. Thanks for everything!"_  

---
  
### **📌 4. LinkedIn Groups (Fraternity, Purdue Alumni, AI/Tech Groups)**
⏳ **Time: 20-30 min**  
✅ **Strategy:** **Post in groups with high engagement.**  

**Post to Drop in Groups** _(Short & direct for max engagement)_  
> _"Hey everyone! Tomorrow, I’m sharing a LinkedIn post about my AI-driven job search experiment—something totally different from traditional job searching. Would love to hear insights from this group on how AI is shifting hiring & careers. Keep an eye out and let me know your thoughts when you see it!"_  

---
  
### **📌 5. Recruiters & Past Job Search Connections**  
⏳ **Time: 45 min (or automate?)**  
✅ **Strategy:** **Copy/paste style message with light customization.**  
✅ **Prioritize recruiters & people engaged in hiring discussions.**  

**Message Template:**  
> _"Hey [First Name], I wanted to reach out because tomorrow I’m launching a LinkedIn post about an AI-driven job search experiment—something I think will resonate with recruiters and hiring pros. If you see it, I’d love your thoughts! A quick comment would really help it reach more people. Thanks, and hope you’re doing well!"_  

---
  
### **🔹 Execution Plan:**
📌 **Sunday Night:**  
✅ **Identify target people for each bucket.** _(Manual sorting or LinkedIn filters)_  

📌 **Monday Morning (Before Noon):**  
✅ **Send all messages (Manual or Automated).**  
✅ **Post in groups.**  

📌 **Tuesday Morning:**  
🚀 **Launch LinkedIn Post** with pre-warmed engagement.  

---
### **🔹 Next Immediate Task (Next 1 Hour)**  
**1️⃣ Write & finalize all messages.**  
**2️⃣ Identify top people for high-value outreach.**  

💬 Let me know when the messages are ready to go, and we move to execution. 🚀
